articles.description: IPL 2024: Lucknow Super Giants have welcomed former South African all-rounder into their coaching staff as an assistant coach who will collaborate with Justin Langer and S Sriram in guiding the team.

articles.author: Devendra Pandey
articles.title: Rajat Patidar set to be retained for final Test versus England in Dharamsala - The Indian Express
articles.description: If KL Rahul had been fit, Rajat Patidar would have been released and could have played for Madhya Pradesh in the Ranji Trophy semifinal.
articles.content: HE has not been among the runs but middle-order batsman Rajat Patidar is likely to retain his place in the playing XI for the fifth Test match against England starting in Dharamsala on Thursday. The … [+2169 chars]
